name: Libby by OverDrive
description: Free ebooks, audiobooks, and magazines from your local library delivered to your phone or tablet
fullDescription: Libby is the free reading app from OverDrive that connects library cardholders to their library's collection of ebooks, audiobooks, and magazines.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks from your library's collection
- Audiobooks for on-the-go listening
- Digital magazines
- Sync across devices
- Read offline
- Works with multiple library cards
howToGetIt:
1. Download the free Libby app (iOS or Android)
2. Open the app and find your library
3. Sign in with your library card number
4. Browse and borrow from your library's collection
5. Books automatically returnâ€”no late fees
keywords: Libby, OverDrive, ebooks, audiobooks, digital magazines, library app, reading app, free books, no late fees
